timeline.message:
Merge branch 'develop' of https://github.com/ls1intum/Artemis into exam/client/nav-style-fixes

# Conflicts:
#	src/main/webapp/app/exam/participate/exam-navigation-bar/exam-navigation-bar.component.html

#	src/main/webapp/i18n/en/exam.json

no special case for programming exercises
